name: vulnerable-webapp
description: A deliberately vulnerable web application for cybersecurity education

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
